item.title: Dems Quietly Pull Back on Medicaid for Illegal Immigrants
item.description: Taxpayers deserve better than symbolic compassion backed by shell games and ballooning deficits.

item.title: Twinless, an Exercise in Attention to Detail
item.description: The film features characters that are so nuanced that they feel real.

item.title: Looking for a Violent Plot in One Place, Ignoring It Another
item.description: The press was eager to cover a mysterious South Carolina house fire but neglected an obvious plot against conservative Supreme Court justices.

item.title: Birth Centers Promote Birth Freedom and Health Care Abundance
item.description: Restricting proven models of care is indefensible.

item.title: The Utterly Unsurprising ‘Revelation’ That the FBI Perused Senators’ Phone Records
item.description: Why is anyone shocked to hear that the FBI perused senators’ phone records around the time of a riot at the Capitol over which the president had been ...
